channel.title: [508] Drownedscape Source - How to make certain items unspawnable
channel.description:
if (cmd[0].equals("item") && p.rights >= 0) { int itemId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); if (p.rights <= 1) { /*if(itemId == 6570) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn a Fire Cape."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return; }*/ /*if(itemId == 9747 || itemId == 9748 || itemId == 9749 || itemId == 9750 || itemId == 9751 || itemId == 9752 || itemId == 9753 || itemId == 9754 || itemId == 9755 || itemId == 9756 || itemId == 9757 || itemId == 9758 || itemId == 9759 || itemId == 9760 || itemId == 9761 || itemId == 9762 || itemId == 9763 || itemId == 9764 || itemId == 9765 || itemId == 9766 || itemId == 9767 || itemId == 9768 || itemId == 9769 || itemId == 9770 || itemId == 9771 || itemId == 9772 || itemId == 9773 || itemId == 9774 || itemId == 9775 || itemId == 9776 || itemId == 9777 || itemId == 9778 || itemId == 9779 || itemId == 9780 || itemId == 9781 || itemId == 9782 || itemId == 9783 || itemId == 9784 || itemId == 9785 || itemId == 9786 || itemId == 9787 || itemId == 9788 || itemId == 9789 || itemId == 9790 || itemId == 9791 || itemId == 9792 || itemId == 9793 || itemId == 9794 || itemId == 9795 || itemId == 9796 || itemId == 9797 || itemId == 9798 || itemId == 9799 || itemId == 9800 || itemId == 9801 || itemId == 9802 || itemId == 9803 || itemId == 9804 || itemId == 9805 || itemId == 9806 || itemId == 9807 || itemId == 9808 || itemId == 9809 || itemId == 9810 || itemId == 9811 || itemId == 9812 || itemId == 9813 || itemId == 9814 || itemId == 9948 || itemId == 9949 || itemId == 9950 || itemId == 12524) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn SkillCapes."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return; }*/ if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot use commands where you are vulnerable to being attacked!"); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); }
This is the code, i've tried lots of stuff. But no luck, Thanks.

item.title: [508] Drownedscape Source - How to make certain items unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

But i CAN spawn the capes, I need to be able to spawn it if im admin, but unspawnable if im not. THANKS ANYONE?

item.title: [508] Drownedscape Source - How to make certain items unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

i’m pretty sure that all these items you cannot spawn :

/*if(itemId == 9747 || itemId == 9748 || itemId == 9749 || itemId == 9750 || itemId == 9751 || itemId == 9752 || itemId == 9753 || itemId == 9754 || itemId == 9755 || itemId == 9756 || itemId == 9757 || itemId == 9758 || itemId == 9759 || itemId == 9760 || itemId == 9761 || itemId == 9762 || itemId == 9763 || itemId == 9764 || itemId == 9765 || itemId == 9766 || itemId == 9767 || itemId == 9768 || itemId == 9769 || itemId == 9770 || itemId == 9771 || itemId == 9772 || itemId == 9773 || itemId == 9774 || itemId == 9775 || itemId == 9776 || itemId == 9777 || itemId == 9778 || itemId == 9779 || itemId == 9780 || itemId == 9781 || itemId == 9782 || itemId == 9783 || itemId == 9784 || itemId == 9785 || itemId == 9786 || itemId == 9787 || itemId == 9788 || itemId == 9789 || itemId == 9790 || itemId == 9791 || itemId == 9792 || itemId == 9793 || itemId == 9794 || itemId == 9795 || itemId == 9796 || itemId == 9797 || itemId == 9798 || itemId == 9799 || itemId == 9800 || itemId == 9801 || itemId == 9802 || itemId == 9803 || itemId == 9804 || itemId == 9805 || itemId == 9806 || itemId == 9807 || itemId == 9808 || itemId == 9809 || itemId == 9810 || itemId == 9811 || itemId == 9812 || itemId == 9813 || itemId == 9814 || itemId == 9948 || itemId == 9949 || itemId == 9950 || itemId == 12524) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn SkillCapes."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return;
so all you would have to do is add another

|| itemId == (item code) ||

and that will make it unspawnable.

Read full topic
